name: 2018 Soccer Agent - Mobile Football Manager
description:
Play this mobile soccer manager game and GET THE VICTORY!, become billionaire, recruit players and hire them to make money from soccer world, the stadium vibrates with your top football transfers. Recruit the best soccer manager for win the best rewards.

In this soccer game, you have to spy teams and recruit scouts to your team to be a legend of money making and earn prestige to your staff, win negotiations, hire soccer stars, get millions of money from soccer to upgrade your office, the soccer game that you have to recruit the best staff and become a top legendary sport management star.

Win the soccer championships to your top soccer scouts club, be a rich soccer manager and win score hiring the best soccer stars negotiating with the top sport clubs in the world. Make money from your transfers, be a top soccer manager and recruit players from France, Spain, Great Britain, Germany, Italy, Switzerland...
